text: <@U0HPGQ4KH> Sorry we didn’t get time to chat after the call, but I think we need to think about the wood cladding with the option of the other material on the bottom and possibly side of the wall so we can get thoughts to the GC asap
<@U0260V4K1>: <@U0HPGQ4KH> let me know when you guys have a minute - want to make sure we’re planning for communication with the GM on material plans
you and felix might have to go forward without me on this - Im in meetings until 5
but I think felix has a handle on this
it sounds like it’s basically the wood cladding + whatever we want to do with the foot and behind the top sweep of screens
thought the steel substructure was interesting: if that's going to be the substructure underneath the cladding it seems like we could easily ask for a smaller welded steel foot/kickplate
also seems crazily overbuilt if that 2x3" A36 roll steel tube...
AD22 comes in black or white powder coated aluminum
<@U0HPGQ4KH>: also josh sent me this link that shows where he got that info:
he also remembers Brian mentioning black and white when they visited
